DOC.brief_summary: This study design conceptualize school-based prevention program childhood anxiety .
DOC.detailed_description: This project correspond career development grant . The main goal propose research identify potential barrier implement school-based anxiety preventive intervention , identify strategy overcome barrier , use information test school-based indicated intervention child anxiety .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Borderline child anxiety level base Spence Child Anxiety Scale Exclusion : Externalizing problem ( base teacher nomination ) severe Spence Child Anxiety Scale borderline level
